oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Forage feeding for pigs could be beneficial
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Clements, Ruth
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
Feeding and growth
Health and welfare
Pigs
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A trial is conducted at FAI Farms, as part of the Core Organic II ICOPP study, to assess the use of alternative protein sources (peas and beans) as part of a lucerne-silage based ration for pigs.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Clements, Ruth (2013) Forage feeding for pigs could be beneficial. Farmers Guardian, 5 March 2013.
